LanguageData.RecipeBase.label: make canned food
LanguageData.RC2_CookCannedMeat.label: make canned meat
LanguageData.RC2_CookCannedMeat.description: Put meat in a sterlized can to prevent rotting. Works with any meat, including insect and human meat!
LanguageData.RC2_CookCannedFruit.label: make canned fruit
LanguageData.RC2_CookCannedFruit.description: Put fruit in a sterlized can to prevent rotting.
LanguageData.RC2_CookCannedVegetables.label: make canned vegetables
LanguageData.RC2_CookCannedVegetables.description: Put vegetables in a sterlized can to prevent rotting.
LanguageData.RC2_CookCannedMeal.label: make canned meals
LanguageData.RC2_CookCannedMeal.description: Repackage a simple meal into sterilized cans to keep it from spoiling. Makes 10 canned meals out of five simple meals.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeFruitPreserves.label: make fruit preserves
LanguageData.RC2_MakeFruitPreserves.description: Uses sweets and fruit to preserve fruit. Very tasty. Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_Crisps.label: make crisps
LanguageData.RC2_Crisps.description: Make crisps out of vegetables, grains, or fruits. Most commonly made out of potatos or corn though. A tasty, salty snack! Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCupcake.label: bake cupcakes
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCupcake.description: Cupcakes! These delicious, single-serve cakes are a tasty treat for birthday parties or parties in general. Made out of flour, sweeteners, and eggs. Makes 10.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeIcecream.label: make icecream
LanguageData.RC2_MakeIcecream.description: Uses milk, sweeteners, and fruit to make a tub of icecream. Delicious and great for cooling you down on a warm day! Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeChocolateIcecream.label: make chocolate icecream
LanguageData.RC2_MakeChocolateIcecream.description: Uses milk, sweeteners, and chocolate to make a tub of chocolate icecream. Delicious and great for cooling you down on a warm day! Makes 5.
LanguageData.RC2_CookRubaboo.label: cook rubaboo
LanguageData.RC2_CookRubaboo.description: Cooks a meal out of pemmican and just about anything else. Great for lengthening food supplies. Try making it with pemmican and hardtack to really stretch out your food reserves!
LanguageData.RC2_CookExtravagantMeal.label: cook extravagant meal
LanguageData.RC2_CookExtravagantMeal.description: Cooks an extravagant meal out of meat, grains, vegetables, and fruit.
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCurds.label: curdle cheese
LanguageData.RC2_MakeCurds.description: Begin the cheesemaking process by curdling milk.
